BackstoryDef.title: Maxson Heir
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the legendary Maxson bloodline and raised to lead the Brotherhood. As a child, [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed the corruption and decay that followed Lyons' humanitarian policies. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained in both combat and command, learning that only through strength and discipline could the Brotherhood fulfill its true purpose.

BackstoryDef.title: Elder of the Brotherhood
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the youngest Elder in Brotherhood history, uniting the fractured East Coast chapters under [PAWN_possessive] iron will. [PAWN_pronoun] commands the Prydwen and its forces with absolute authority, determined to cleanse the Commonwealth of synths and mutants while reclaiming technology for humanity's survival.

BackstoryDef.title: Rivet City Orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up believing [PAWN_pronoun] was an orphan in the Capital Wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed the Brotherhood's power and nobility firsthand, developing an unwavering belief in their mission. What [PAWN_pronoun] didn't know was that these memories were fabricated - [PAWN_pronoun] was actually a synth.

BackstoryDef.title: Paladin of Steel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose through the Brotherhood ranks to become a respected Paladin, leading recon teams with tactical precision and unwavering dedication. [PAWN_pronoun] believes absolutely in the Brotherhood's mission, never suspecting [PAWN_possessive] true nature until it's revealed [PAWN_pronoun] is a synth - the very thing [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to destroy.

BackstoryDef.title: Technical Apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed early aptitude for technology and science, earning [PAWN_possessive] place in the Brotherhood's Scribe order. [PAWN_pronoun] studied pre-war technology with fascination, learning to diagnose and repair complex systems while developing field survival skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Field Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a field scribe with Recon Squad Gladius, providing technical support and intelligence analysis in dangerous territory. [PAWN_pronoun] maintains communications equipment and analyzes data while supporting [PAWN_possessive] teammates in combat situations.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Born
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the Brotherhood and raised with strict military discipline. [PAWN_pronoun] trained constantly in combat techniques, developing a competitive nature and strong sense of Brotherhood superiority over outsiders.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned the rank of Knight through rigorous training and combat experience. [PAWN_pronoun] serves with Recon Squad Gladius, displaying considerable combat skill but struggling with trust issues toward outsiders and a bitter attitude from past losses.

BackstoryDef.title: Engineering Prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed exceptional mechanical aptitude from childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] could disassemble and rebuild power armor components before most children could read, earning [PAWN_possessive] place in the Brotherhood's engineering division.

BackstoryDef.title: Head Engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the Brotherhood's chief engineer despite losing [PAWN_possessive] legs in combat. [PAWN_pronoun] designed [PAWN_possessive] own power armor exoskeleton to compensate, and now maintains the entire Brotherhood fleet including the Prydwen. [PAWN_possessive] expertise keeps the Brotherhood's technology operational.

BackstoryDef.title: Strategic Mind
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up studying military history and tactics, showing natural leadership abilities. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to coordinate complex operations and manage logistics, preparing for a command role in the Brotherhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Prydwen Captain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] commands the Prydwen, the Brotherhood's massive airship headquarters. [PAWN_pronoun] manages all air operations and coordinates ground missions with tactical precision. [PAWN_possessive] by-the-book approach and unwavering loyalty to Elder Maxson make [PAWN_objective] an invaluable asset.

BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland Fighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to fight for survival in the harsh wasteland before joining the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] found purpose and structure in the Brotherhood's ranks, dedicating [PAWN_objective]self to their military doctrine.

BackstoryDef.title: Sole Survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led Recon Squad Artemis until disaster struck - [PAWN_possessive] entire team was killed in the Commonwealth. Wracked with guilt and trauma, [PAWN_pronoun] went into hiding, questioning everything [PAWN_pronoun] once believed about the Brotherhood's invincibility.

BackstoryDef.title: Medical Student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed early interest in medicine and human anatomy. [PAWN_pronoun] studied pre-war medical texts and learned to treat injuries, preparing for a career saving lives in the Brotherhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Chief Medical Officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as the Brotherhood's chief medical officer aboard the Prydwen. [PAWN_pronoun] treats wounded soldiers and manages medical supplies with clinical efficiency. [PAWN_possessive] gruff bedside manner hides genuine concern for [PAWN_possessive] patients' wellbeing.

BackstoryDef.title: Archive Assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth organizing and cataloging the Brotherhood's extensive archives. [PAWN_pronoun] memorized vast amounts of information and developed expertise in research methodologies and data analysis.

BackstoryDef.title: Head Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] leads the Brotherhood's Scribe division, managing all research and intelligence operations. [PAWN_pronoun] processes field reports, maintains archives, and coordinates technical support for military operations. [PAWN_possessive] encyclopedic knowledge makes [PAWN_objective] invaluable to the Brotherhood's mission.

BackstoryDef.title: Supply Counter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned logistics and resource management from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] tracked supplies, managed inventories, and developed an understanding of what the Brotherhood needed to survive and thrive.

BackstoryDef.title: Quartermaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] manages the Brotherhood's supply operations as head quartermaster. [PAWN_pronoun] acquires resources through trade, requisition, and occasionally morally questionable means. [PAWN_pronoun] believes the Brotherhood's mission justifies any method of securing needed supplies.
